categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: Keep your hands free and your stride smooth with this ergonomic, bounce-free running belt. The Trail Mix Plus carries two 300ml flasks and the zippered storage pocket has space for gels, most phones and small accessories like keys or cards. Handy shock cord loops let you stash items like gloves, hats or a windbreaker if conditions change.Ergonomic belt stretches in multiple directions for a secure, bounce-free fit.Secure holsters allow one-handed access to flasks.2, 300ml ergonomic flasks included.Zip pocket has a front stash pouch for gels, and fits most large-format phones.Dual shock cords with quick-pull tensioners for extra capacity.Elastic keepers retain excess strap length.Reflective trim.Fits waist circumferences of 66-112cm (25-44in.).
name: Nathan Trail Mix Plus Hydration Belt - Unisex
